title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 990.6 - Staff services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 990.6 - Staff services

State Regulations

Staff services for the Safety Board shall be performed by
personnel of the Department of Transportation and such others as the Safety

Board may deem appropriate, including but not limited to private consultants. The executive director shall coordinate and direct the activities of the staff, which shall be the primary investigative unit of the Safety

Board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
990.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
